nodes.text: Tomaas Azzameen was a male individual who was a member of the Azzameen family. He was the father of at least four children, including Galin and Ace. Tomaas owned the YT-2000 Otana. Around the time of the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY, Tomaas traveled to Hoth with his eldest son, Galin, to supply the Alliance to Restore the Republic with bacta, though the pair managed to escape the Galactic Empire's assault on the planet. Sometime later during another run to supply the Alliance, Tomaas and Galin were killed.
